backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining data types, stable state, and admin‑gated CRUD APIs for events, APK URL, and other site content, integrating access control and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module initializing a new empty events map when upgrading the canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/docs/adsense.md: Guide explaining how to enable and configure Google AdSense via environment variables.
frontend/docs/android-apk-from-pwa.md: Documentation describing how to generate an Android APK from the PWA using Trusted Web Activity and Bubblewrap.
frontend/docs/production-deploy-google-s: Instructions for production deployment and Google Search Console verification, including prerequisites and build steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file setting metadata, SEO tags, PWA configuration, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Placeholder AdSense ads.txt file instructing users to replace it with their publisher ID.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining icons, colors, metadata, and display settings for the application.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots rules allowing crawlers while blocking admin routes and pointing to the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing public site URLs with change frequency and priority metadata.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements a versioned PWA service worker with install, activate, and fetch handlers for caching static assets and using network-first strategies.
frontend/scripts/run-prod-build-with-gsc: Runs the production build and enforces Google Search Console meta‑tag verification, exiting on any failure.
frontend/scripts/verify-gsc-meta.ts: Validates that the built index.html contains the required GSC verification meta tag and halts the build if missing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application router and page routes using TanStack Router, mapping all public and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/MediaPicke: Lets admins upload and preview images or videos with validation, progress tracking, and removal support.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by checking admin session status and redirecting unauthorized users to the login page.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with social links, quick links, branding, and share functionality.
frontend/src/components/HomeBottomNavMen: Provides a mobile bottom navigation sheet that lists primary routes and the user’s Me link.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Displays a PWA install prompt banner with install and dismiss actions when the app is installable.
frontend/src/components/SettingsSheet.ts: Provides a right-side settings panel with theme switch, share link, PWA install, and APK download actions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Renders the responsive top navigation bar with links, branding, mobile menu, share link, settings sheet, and logout handling.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Provides branding logo utilities with a fallback image path.
frontend/src/config/navLinks.ts: Defines primary navigation links and returns the correct 'Me' link based on admin status.
frontend/src/config/publicSite.ts: Exports the shared public production site URL constant.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Stores and persists simple admin login state using hardcoded credentials.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, status tracking, and stored identity loading via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt availability, installation detection, and user dismissal state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including branding, history, membership registrations, clubs, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Handles theme state, applies the selected theme, and provides a light/dark toggle.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and defines light/dark CSS variables and typography styles.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with top navigation, routed content, and a footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the public About page with story, mission, vision, and values sections.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAboutPage.tsx: Admin interface for editing About sections, including text, media, and ordering.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAndroidApkPage.t: Admin page for viewing and updating the Android APK download URL with validation and status messages.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Admin page to load, display, and update branding media such as the organization logo with success and error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AdminClubsManagerPage: Provides CRUD management for clubs, including forms for editing details and confirmation dialogs for deletion.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin landing page offering navigation to various content‑management tools like branding, home page, about, and more.
frontend/src/pages/AdminEventsManagerPag: Interface for creating, editing, validating, and deleting events, with form state management and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHistoryEditorPag: Editor for updating the organization's history text and media, with loading, saving, and success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHomePageEditorPa: Implements an admin interface for viewing, editing, adding, and removing home page sections and saving them via API mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Provides a login form for admins that authenticates via useAdminSession and redirects to the dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMembershipReview: Displays and manages a list of membership registrations, including loading, error, and empty states.
Allows admins to view and update social media link URLs with form handling, validation, and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ClubDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed information about a specific club, including loading, error, and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/ClubsPage.tsx: Displays a list of clubs with loading, error, empty states, and links to individual club pages, plus a call‑to‑action section.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact methods including email, phone, address, and office hours using card layouts.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays upcoming events with date parsing, handling loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Loads and displays organization history content with optional media and full handling of loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, dynamic content sections from backend, and install/navigation components.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipRegistratio: Provides a membership registration form with submission handling, success state, and optional admin login link.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a scrollable privacy policy page with sections describing data collection, usage, and disclosure.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of youth programs with icons, descriptions, ages, schedules, and a call-to-action section.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Renders a scrollable terms of service page detailing user agreements, conduct rules, and usage restrictions.
frontend/src/utils/adsense.ts: Provides a function to inject the Google AdSense script once using a Vite environment variable.
frontend/src/utils/media.ts: Contains media file validation utilities, type checks, file conversion to Uint8Array, and preview URL helpers.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Updates canonical and Open Graph URL meta tags for SEO, with helpers to apply changes for a given route path.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Implements URL sharing via the Web Share API with clipboard-based fallback and structured result reporting.
frontend/src/utils/theme.ts: Manages light/dark theme persistence in localStorage and applies the theme to the document root.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color variables, extended radii, shadows, and accordion animations with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, including scope, architecture, known issues, features, and metadata for ongoing UI, deployment, and PWA improvements.
